text: Du Jinfang (杜近芳; 1932 – 17 April 2021) was a Chinese actress. She worked at the of the China National Peking Opera Company. She appeared in the 1972 movie The Red Detachment of Women. She was vice chairman of the All-China Youth Federation.Wir trauern um Ursula Schumm-Garling (20.3.1938–20.4.2021) Jinfang died on 17 April 2021, aged 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese stage actors Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese singers Category:20th-century Chinese actors
title: Du Jinfang
